name: Sussy maze: REVAMPED
description:
This is sussy maze: REVAMPED, Just like the classic, but better!

Experience a maze with 6 endings, not just a maze, a SUSSY MAZE.

The sussy maze collection was going to be cancelled because I thought nobody would like the game n' stuff, LMAO, so, I hope you enjoy the game!

And please comment your rating on this game.

NEW FEATURES:

Jump

footsteps

easier but confusing maze

Added credits board.

Improvements:

Lighting

Graphics

Story

It can now run better in Windows 8 (I think bc I don't have Windows 8, but I'm pretty sure…)

Excellent size for this type of game

Credits:

Credits to cadaver for making the game.

Credits to krinkles for the image in the 6th ending

credits to kodaka for the images in the co-auditor ending

More inside the game in the credits board!
